info.title: ItsMyCargo API V1
info.description: This is an API for accessing ItsMyCargo.

id.description: Unique identifier of the given cargo item type

type.description: Generic type of the cargo item

attributes.description: Descriptive attributes of the cargo item

width.description: Width of the given cargo item type

length.description: Length of the given cargo item type

description.description: Descriptive information of the cargo item type

oauth.description: This API uses OAuth2 with the password grant flow.

endpoint.description: Endpoint url that Ahoy will redirect to start the booking process

air.description: Supported cargo types for Air Cargo

rail.description: Supported cargo types for Rail Cargo

ocean.description: Supported cargo types for Ocean Cargo

truck.description: Supported cargo types for Trucking Cargo

get.summary: Fetch list of itineraries belonging to a tenant
